hint.en: Reverse Sensor Reports (both Sensor Binary Report and Notification Report.

label.en: Open Status when Magnet is away, Close Status when magnet is near.
Close Status when Magnet is away, Open Status when magnet is near.

hint.en: Configure the Basic Set value. Determine the Basic Set value to control other Z-Wave devices directly when Magnet is away or near.

label.en: ON when Magnet is away, and send OFF when Magnet is near.
OFF when Magnet is away, and send ON when Magnet is near.
Only send ON when Magnet is away.
Only send OFF when Magnet is near.
Only send OFF when Magnet is away.
Only send ON when Magnet is near.

hint.en: Control LED Indicator. Determine whether the LED flash or not when sending Basic Set, Sensor Binary Report, Notification Report (Access Control) or Wake Up Notification.

label.en: LED quickly flashes only when sending Basic Set, Sensor Binary Report or Notification Report (Access Control).
LED activates only when sending Wake Up Notification.
LED quickly flashes when sending Basic Set, Sensor Binary Report or Notification Report (Access Control), and activates when sending Wake Up Notification.

hint.en: Configure the low battery threshold. Induce battery report when battery level is less than or equal to threshold. Forward low battery report.
Set how often battery is reported in minutes.
